title: Best of The Herd: 03/04/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/04/2019
description:
Colin says that LeBron has been a bad leader ever since joining the Lakers.  He thinks Antonio Brown is doing everything the wrong way this off-season.  He admits where he was right and wrong over the weekend.  Plus, Joel Klatt comes in studio to talk about Kyler Murray potentially going number 1 to the Cardinals in the NFL Draft.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
